data.title: TOASTER: Times-Of-Arrival Tracker
data.name: TOASTER
data.description: A framework for generating, storing and tracking high-precision TOAs for PTAs as well as observation meta data and processing details.

evidence: "TOASTER is the 'TOAs Tracker'. It is designed to store reduced/folded observations, meta data, templates, parfiles, TOAs, timfiles in an organized manner using an SQL database."
"The framework can also be used to generate TOAs from observations using flexible and repoducible plugins referred to as 'manipulators'."
Author line lists an individual: "Patrick Lazarus (plazarus@mpifr-bonn.mpg.de)" with others only as "With help from". No mention of package managers or binaries, implying source-based use.
